Description: Stamp (vessel): quarter-qisṭ. Five line Kufic inscription. Piece of vessel with rim attached. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: See also OA+ 4052. From the same die: Balog, P. 1976. ‘Ummayad, ʿAbbasid and Ṭūlūnid glass weights and vessel-stamps’. New York, 250. Cf. Launois, Aimée. 1957. Estampilles et poids faibles en verre Omeyyades et Abbasides au Musée Arabe du Caire, ‘Mélanges islamologiques’ III, 113; Balog, P. 1976. ‘Ummayad, ʿAbbasid and Ṭūlūnid glass weights and vessel-stamps’. New York, 251.
Another stamp of the same denomination on which ʿĪsā bears the title 'al-amīr' is much more common.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (142)
